name.baseName: ไฟฟ้า ภาพรวมไฟฟ้า
name.mixAndLocationTypes: กระแสไฟฟ้าเฉลี่ยยึดตลาด ณ ผู้บริโภค

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Good overall data quality. Energy carrier mix information based on official statistical information including import/export. Detailed power plant models were used, which combine measured emissions plus calculated values for not measured emissions of e.g. single organics and heavy metals. Energy carrier extraction and processing data is of sufficient to good (e.g. refinery) data quality. Inventory is partly based on primary industry data, partly on secondary literature data.

referenceToExternalDocumentation.common:shortDescription: XY Consult Electricity Mix DE 1998 LCI report

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: Provision of 1 MJ electricity (AC) at 220 V to the consumer

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: Whole year; average mix across seasonal variations.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: Average data for Germany. If specific electricity supplier is used (e.g. for site specific modelling), the mix might be different (e.g. if regional wind power electricity is contracted). No further restrictions.

subLocationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: Average data for Germany, no individual sub-locations explicitely considered and combined.
Durchschnittliche Daten für Deutschland, keine speziellen Daten für inviduelle Unterregionen

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The electricity consumption mix consists of 25.57 % Hard coal power plant, 27.57 % Lignite power plant, 35.91 % Nuclear power plant, 5.84 % Natural gas power plant, 0.54 % Crude oil power plant, 4.09 % Hydro power plant, 0.31 % Wind power plant, 0.46 % Waste incineration plant, 0.13 % Biomass power plant. Other relevant included process are the refinery and the energy carrier exploitation and extraction processes (the latter ones are not separately available).

Der Elektrizitätskonsummix besteht aus 25,57 % Steinkohlekraftwerke, 27,57 Braunkohle-Kraftwerke, 35,91 % Kernkraftwerke, 5,84 % Gaskraftwerke, 0.54 % Erdölkraftwerke, 4,09 % Wasserkraftwerke, 0,31 % Windkraftwerke, 0,46 % Müllverbrennungsanlagen und 0,13 % Biomassekraftwerke. Andere relevante und inkludierte Prozesse sind Raffinerieprozesse, Energietransport und Extraktionsprozesse
technology.technologicalApplicability: Use for (typically small to medium) electrical appliances at 220 V AC.
Dieser Energiedatensatz kann für kleine bis mittlere elektrische Anwendungsbereiche bei 220 V Wechselstrom eingesetzt werden.

referenceToTechnologyFlowDiagrammOrPictu.common:shortDescription: Flowchart de mistura de electricidade alemao de 1998

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: Ganz tolles Model nur für den Test.

variableParameter.name: so2
variableParameter.comment: [kg] Typical range 0.5E-4 to 5E-4kg/MJ electr. Calculates SO2 emissions from a manually entered S-content. Testdummy
Kalkuliert die SO2 Emission von einem manuell einzugebenden S-Inhalt.

LCIMethodAndAllocation.modellingConstants: All data used in the calculation of the LCI results refer to net calorific value. For the transport of energy carriers average transport processes (ship, pipeline, rail, road) are used.

Alle Daten, die für die Berechnung des LCI Datensatzes benutzt wurden, beziehen sich auf den Unteren Heizwert. Für den Energieträgertransport wurde Duchschnittswerte für den Transport mit Schiff, Pipeline, Bahn und Straße benutzt.

referenceToLCAMethodDetails.common:shortDescription: Sachinventar Methodologie-Report der Fa. XY Consult, 2000

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataCutOffAndCompletenessPrinciples: Cut-off rules for each unit coverage of at least 95 % of mass and energy of the Input and of the Output flows, and 98 % of their environmental relevance (according to expert judgement).
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.deviationsFromCutOffAndCompletenessPrinc: The coverage for the exploration data is only 90% of mass and energy and 95% of the environmental relevance (expert judgement).
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data sources for the complete product system are sufficiently consistent: The grid mix data is based on national statistics. The key emissions, e.g. carbon dioxide, sulphur dioxide, etc., of the power plants are based on measured operating data. All other emissions from the power plants are based on literature data and/or calculated via energy carrier composition in combination with (literature-based) combustion models. The data on the energy carrier supply chain is based on statistics with country-wise transport distances and energy carrier composition, as well as industry and literature data on the inventory of exploration and extraction. Refinery data are based on measurements of major refineries. Grid losses are taken from national statistics. LCI modelling is fully consistent.
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: Energy carrier specific power plants are modelled according to national combustion technology mix. Data measured at representative power plants for each of the main power plant types have been upscaled to the country mix of power plant technologies.

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Electricity Information 1995 from ELECTRIC Energy association
Information über Elektrizität 1995 des ELECTRIC Elektrizitäts-Verbandes

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.samplingProcedure: Energy carriers production total annual production volume; emission factors from 5 samples during the year. Land use from maps of producers. Electric. conversion: total annual production volume measured. Emissions as daily 30 min average values (random sampling time).
Totales jährliches Energietransportvolumen, Emissionsfaktoren von 5 Messungen während des Jahres, Landnutzung über Karten
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: No special use advice; grid losses are included. (This data set is intended exclusively to show the rough use of (almost) all documentation fields, NOT good documentation or LCA practice or a consistent/valid data set.)
Keine besonderen Hinweise, Netzverluste sind eingeschlossen.

completeness.completenessOtherProblemField: Noise-XY-Indicator; A. Braun (2005): A novel method for the integration of noise into LCA. SuperPublishing. 12/2005 pp 23-35.
Noise-XY-Indicator; A. Braun (2005): A novel method for the integration of noise into LCA. SuperPublishing. 12/2005 pp 23-35.

common:scope.name: LCI results or Partly terminated system

review.common:reviewDetails: The dataset is of adequate data quality in view of the intended use as well as stated geographical and technology coverage. No other aspect has been reviewed. The LCI method applied is in compliance with ISO 14040 ff. The documentation includes all relevant information in view of data quality and scope of application of the respective LCI result. Dataset represents state of the art in view of the referenced functional unit. The energy balance is closed. The discrepancy in the mass balance fits to the documented method of not considering air input to incineration etc.
Hier deutsche Beschreibung der Review Details
review.common:otherReviewDetails: no further comments after publication were received/documented

common:commissionerAndGoal.common:project: Internet Site on Life Cycle Assessment Tools and Services and Life Cycle Inventory Data in support of European Integrated Product Policy, Reference: ENV.A.2/SER/2003/0110
Internet Site für Life Cycle Assessment Tools und Services und Life Cycle Inventory Data zur Unterstützung der europäischen Integrierten Product Politik (IPP)
common:commissionerAndGoal.common:intendedApplications: Publication as background data for use in LCA studies, except for comparative assertions diclosed to the public, which need an independent external review
Publikation als Hintergrunddatensatz für allen Arten von Studien, mit Ausnahme von publizierten Ökobilanzvergleichen, wofür ein Unbhängiges Externes Review benötigt wird.

common:referenceToPrecedingDataSetVersio.common:shortDescription: DE - Power grid mix AC 220V of 1997

common:referenceToEntitiesWithExclusiveA.common:shortDescription: Fictive: Company A including access to confidential raw data

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
publicationAndOwnership.common:accessRestrictions: None, but when using the data set, reference to the owner of data set is to be provided by citing the entry in the respective "ownership" contact data set.
Keine, aber wenn der Datensatz benutzt wird, muss eine Referenz auf den Eigentümer gesetzt werden.

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Other source, page 47. (Reference to corresponding data source for the data of the Uniform distribution min and max values)

exchange.generalComment: No usable measured data. Uniformly distributed data had to be assumed, according to "Other source".
Keine brauchbaren Messwerte. Gleichverteilte Werte wurden angenommen, gemäß der Quelle "Other source".

Example of SO2 calculation in parameterised data set via the variable so2 of the "Mathematical model" section. Note that uncertainty values of the Mathematical model section and those given here overlay each other.
Beispiel für die SO2 Kalkulation in parametrisierten Datensätzen über die Variable so2. ...

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: Particles 0.2 to 2 µm - Emissions to air
Partikel 0,2 bis 2 µm - Emissionen in Luft

exchange.generalComment: Illustrative Reminder flow of power plants' internal electricity consumption over cradle-to-gate.
Illustrativer Reminder flow des Kraftwerks-internen Elektrizitätsverbrauchs über den Lebensweg Elektrizitätsdatensatz.

LCIAResult.generalComment: Super2007 single-indicator cradle-to-gate LCIA result of this unit process data set after completing the inventory with the 2005 inventory data of the SuPi LCA database.
